title: Get Started with Kedro
description: Learn the basics of Kedro by setting up a project and creating a data processing pipeline.

courses.title: Install and setup Kedro
courses.description: Install Kedro and setup your first project.

courses.title: Set up the data
courses.description: We discuss the data set-up phase, which is the second part of the standard development workflow.

courses.title: Create a pipeline
courses.description: We create a data processing pipeline together.
